data.actual_result: The error message shows failed markdown.
data.expected_result: The error message shouldn't attempt to use markdown.
data.short_description: When denied changing your nickname in Server Settings' Members list, the error message attempts to use markdown but it doesn't work.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server on an alternate account (can be done on desktop). - On that new server, allow the `@everyone` role to View Audit Log, and deny Change Nickname & Manage Nicknames (can be done on desktop). - Join the server (all following steps on iOS). - Make sure you don't have any additional roles. - Open Server Settings. - Tap Members. - Tap yourself. - Try to change your nickname.
